clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of SB1518 for the Treatment of Advanced Lymphoid Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Safety and Efficacy Study of SB1518 for the Treatment of Advanced Lymphoid Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 2 study to assess the efficacy of SB1518 in the treatment of patients with advanced lymphoid malignancies including Hodgkin Lymphoma, Mantle Cell Lymphoma and Indolent Lymphoma (follicular lymphoma, lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma, marginal zone lymphoma and small lymphocytic lymphoma).

primary_outcome.measure: Assess overall tumor response of SB1518 by CT/FDG-PET scan and bone marrow biopsy as applicable as a measure of efficacy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every even numbered cycle from baseline to 30 days after the last dose of study medication
primary_outcome.description: Outcome Measure - To assess the efficacy of SB1518 in the treatment of patients with advanced lymphoid malignancies including Hodgkin Lymphoma, Mantle Cell Lymphoma and Indolent Lymphoma (follicular lymphoma, lymphophasmacytic lymphoma, marginal zone lymphoma and small lymphocytic lymphoma).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every even numbered cycle from baseline to 30 days after the last dose of study medication
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the durability of response following SB1518 treatment in patients with advanced lymphoid malignancies.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess number of patients with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every even numbered cycle from baseline to 30 days after the last dose of study medication
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the safety and tolerability of SB1518 administered orally once daily in patients with advanced lymphoid malignancies.

intervention.description: SB1518 taken orally daily for 28 consecutive days in a 28 day cycle.
